articles.description: Diana drove the rare black Ford Escort RS Turbo for nearly three years and was regularly pictured using it on London shopping trips.
articles.content:
Comment on this story
A souped-up version of a popular 80s family car that once belonged to Princess Diana has sold for nearly $764,000 at auction, a record for the model, after a bidding war broke … [+3890 chars]
